snippet.title: Smart Technology OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
My first game (1 For Yes 0 For No, which is releasing November 6th on Steam and itch.io, for anyone who's forgotten) hasn't officially released yet, and I've already got another game on the market!  This game was made as a part of Scream Jam 2020, and took about seven days to make.  It ended up being something really neat and sp00ky.

ITCH.IO: https://sciaenops.itch.io/smart-technology

ORIGINAL DESCRIPTION:
"It’s almost Halloween.  You’ve been hired to house-sit for the reclusive widow who lives on the outskirts of town.  Her home is outfitted with the latest tech, and an impressive artificial intelligence named Agatha controls it all.  But something has gone wrong.  The AI considers you an intruder and will neutralize you at the first sign of perceived hostility. 

Tread carefully.  Survive the evening.  Outsmart the AI.

Agatha is watching.

    • A short game about a smart house
    • More specifically, a science fiction/horror choose-your-own-adventure game
    • Vintage look meant to emulate 50’s horror movies in a modern setting
    • Multiple grisly and gruesome endings
    • Featuring photography from Unsplash.com, sound effects by Zapsplat.com, and music by Alexander Nakarada

CONTENT WARNING: There are multiple endings that can end in your demise.  While no blood or gore is shown on-screen, it is described in some detail.  The game is only as violent as your mind makes it. "
